If you believe this, then it will be true. And we're less likely to challenge ourselves.

1090827061864759296.text: Btw, none of this is meant to suggest that severe mental illness and depression can just be willed away with a few therapy sessions and meditation. Some people require pharmaceutical intervention and other modalities. One size does not fit all. We all deserve empathy.

1090825518843228161.text: By even just sitting with those feelings, being with them...their power over you grows weaker. And then you can start to understand that *you are not your thoughts.* You can't control them but you can change how you receive them and even alter the things that trigger them.

1090825517857595393.text: What all these things have in common is the fact that you must confront your  feelings and beliefs head on. You can't shy away. Counterintuitively, it's actually the resistance to them that causes some of the most stress.
